name: Cell: Automata
description:
Cell:Automata

A NieR: Automata fan game, combining the hacking sub-game with levels generated through a technique called Cellular Automata!

Created from scratch in 2 days as both an homage to a brilliant game, and test of personal skill.

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • Move - WASD
  • Look - IJKL / Arrow Keys
  • Shoot - Space

XBox Controller:

  • Move - Left Stick
  • Look - Right Stick
  • Shoot - Right Trigger

Follow me on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/Pheonise

Additional Credits:

Song credits;
Song Title: Bipolar Nightmare (双極ノ悪夢)
Composer(s): Keiichi Okabe, Keigo Hoashi
Arranged by: http://www.youtube.com/user/FreaperX

NieR:Automata credits;
Producer: Yosuke Saito
Director: YOKO TARO
Composer: Keiichi Okabe
Character design: Akihiko Yoshida
Development: PlatinumGames
